title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Accountancy are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subjects must include:

1.  English Language; (Literature-in-English and Oral English are not   acceptable in place of English Language);

2.  Mathematics;

3.  Any one (1) of the following:

Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book keeping;

4.  Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Geography, Government/Civic Education, Agric. Science/ Animal Husbandry/Biology/Chemistry/Physics, Data Processing/ICT/Computer Studies, Insurance, Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book keeping, Entrepreneurship Education.
subjects:
-   English Language;           

-   Mathematics;

-   Any two (2) from Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts, Economics.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIO-ENVIRONMENTAL  ENGINEERING/TECH
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Agricultural and Bio-Environmental Engineering are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 

The subjects must include:

 

1.           English Language;

2.           Mathematics;

3.           Physics;

4.           Chemistry;

5.           Any one (1) of the followings:

Biology, Agricultural Science, Animal Husbandry, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Crop Production, Tractor Mechanics, Refrigeration and Air Conditioning, Engine Maintenance/Machine, Transmission System, Statistics, Geography, Economics, Data Processing/ICT/ Computer Studies. OR

 

In addition to the above, NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) with a core subject from Trade Related Area such as Metal Work/Tractor, Tractor Mechanics, Auto Mechanics, Electrical Installation and Maintenance Works/Welding Fabrication/Technical Drawing/Building Construction.

 

NOTE:  Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate (NBC)
subjects:
-           English Language;

-           Mathematics;

-           Physics;

-      Chemistry.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING/TECHNOLOGY
subjects:
- English Language;

- Mathematics;

- Physics;

- Chemistry.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Agricultural Technology are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/GCE O’level/ SSCE/NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 The subjects must include:

1. English;

2. Mathematics;

3. Chemistry;

4. Any one (1) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science;

5. Plus any one (1) of the following:

Economics, Geography, Statistics, Physics, Civic Education/Government, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing, Animal Husbandry/Fisheries, Home Economics/Home Management, Food and Nutrition, Forestry.

NABTEB - National Technical Certificate/General Education in the relevant courses is also      acceptable.

NOTE: Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate (NBC)
subjects:
- English Language;

- Chemistry;

- Mathematics/Physics;

- Biology/Agricultural Science.

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Architectural Technology are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 The subjects must include:

1. English Language;

2. Physics;

3. Mathematics;

4. Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Fine Art, Technical Drawing, Economics, Electrical Installation/Woodwork/ Metal Work/Painting, Decoration, Carpentry & Joinery, Building Construction/Plumbing & Pipe Fitting/Block Laying, Geography, Data Processing /ICT/ Computer Studies, Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry, Chemistry, CRS/IRS, Music, History, Government/Civic Education, Literature-in-English.
subjects:
-   English Language;            

-   Mathematics;

-   Any two (2) from Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing

title: ARTS & DESIGN
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Art and Industrial Design are Five (5) Credits passes in not more that two (2) sittings in WASC/NECO/GCE O’level/ SSCE/ NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 

The subjects must include:

 

1. English Language;

2. Mathematics;

3. Plus any other three (3) of the following:

Fine art, Technical Drawing, Chemistry, Physics, Economics/Commerce, Literature in English, CRS/IRS, Government/ History/Civic Education, Biology/Agric. Science/Animal Husbandry,  ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, Entrepreneurship Education, Financial Accounting, Dyeing and Bleaching/Clothing and Textile/Garment Making, Painting and Decoration/Printing Craft/Photography, Food and Nutrition/Home Management/Home Economics, a Nigerian Language.
subjects:
-   English Language;  

-   Mathematics;

-   And any other two (2) from Chemistry, History, Biology/Agric. Science, Fine Arts, Economics, a Nigerian Language.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Banking & Finance are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/ GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subjects must include:

1.       English Language;

2.       Mathematics;

3.       Any one of the following:

Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping;

4.        Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Geography, Government/Civic Education, Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry /Physics/Chemistry, Computer Studies/Data Processing/ICT, Insurance, Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping,

Entrepreneurship Education.
subjects:
-   English Language;           

-   Mathematics;

-   Any two (2) from Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping, Economics, Insurance.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Building Technology are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/GCE O’level/ SSCE/NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings

The subjects must include:

1. Mathematics;

2. English Language;

3. Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agric. Science/Animal Husbandry;

4. And any one (1) of the following:

Economics, Principles of Accounts, Technical Drawing, Building Construction, Building Drawing, Woodwork /Metalwork/Carpentry & Joinery/Painting /Decoration /Plumbing & Pipe Fitting/ Block Laying, Basic Surveying, Geography, Government/Civic Education, Commerce, Biology/Agric Science/Health Science/Animal Husbandry, Fine Art, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing, Further Mathematics, Draughtsmanship/Graphic Design.
subjects:
-   English Language;            

-   Mathematics;

-   Any two (2) from

Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts, Economics, Woodwork

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Business Administration and Management are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subjects must include:

1   English Language;

2.  Mathematics;

3   Any one (1) of the following:

Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book keeping;

4    Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agric. Sc./Physics/Animal Husbandry/Chemistry, ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, History/Government/Civic Education, Geography, Marketing, Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping, Literature-in-English, Business Method/Business Studies/Office Practice, Store Keeping/Store Management, Entrepreneurship Education, Social Studies, Insurance

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Civil Engineering are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/ GCE O’level/ SSCE/NABTEB - National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 The subjects must include:

   1      English Language;

2      Mathematics;

3      Physics;

4     Chemistry;

5.    Plus any one (1) of the  following:

Geography, Biology, Economics, Further Mathematics, Civic Education/Government, Technical Drawing/Building Construction/Woodwork/Metal Work, Statistics, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing;

OR

1. Five O’level Credit passes in NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) which must include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one (1) related trade subject from Block Laying, Building Drawing, Technical Drawing, Building Construction, Woodwork, Metalwork, Carpentry and Joinery, Plumbing and Pipe Fitting, Building Technology, Concrete Technology, etc

NOTE:  Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate(NBC)
subjects:
-   English Language;        

-   Mathematics;                     

-   Physics;

-   Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Computer Science are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/ GCE O’level/SSCE/ NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subjects must include:

1. English;

2. Mathematics;

3. Physics;

4. Plus any two (2) of the following:

Chemistry, Agricultural Science/Biology/Animal Husbandry/Food & Nutrition, Statistics, Economics /Commerce, Technical Drawing. Additional/Further Mathematics, Geography, ICT/Computer Studies/Data Processing, Fine Arts.
subjects:
-   English Language;           

-   Mathematics;

-   Physics;

-   And any one (1) from Chemistry, Biology/Agric. Science, Statistics, Economics, Geography,             Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Electrical and Electronic Engineering are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO/GCE O’level /SSCE/NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

 The subjects must include:    

 1  English;

2  Mathematics;   

3  Physics;

4  Chemistry;

5  Plus any one (1) of the following:

Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Electrical Installation & Maintenance Works, Computer Studies/ICT/Data Processing, Radio/Television & Electrical Works, Instrument Mechanics, Appliances Maintenance and Repairs, Basic Electronics/Electricity, Biology.

 NOTE: Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate (NBC)
subjects:
-   English Language;           

-   Mathematics;

-   Physics;

-   Chemistry.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Estate Management and Valuation are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/ GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subjects must include:

3.   Economics;

Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Agric. Science, Animal Husbandry, Health Science.

Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Agric. Science, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping, Literature in English, Government/Civic Education, Commerce, Fine Arts, Basic Surveying, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing or Woodwork.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics  and any two (2) from Geography,  Government, Principles of Accounts, Economics/Commerce

Economics/Commerce or Principles of Accounts/Book keeping;

Sc./Physics /Animal Husbandry /Chemistry, ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, History/Government/Civic Education, Geography, Marketing, Economics/Commerce, Principles of Accounts/Book Keeping, Literature-in-English, Store Keeping/Store Management, Business Method/Business Studies/Office Practice, Entrepreneurship Education, Social Studies, Insurance

4.   Plus any other two (2) of the following:

Government/Civic Education/History, Economics/Commerce, Biology/Agric. Science/Animal Husbandry/Physics /Chemistry, CRS/IRS, Entrepreneurship Education and a Nigerian Language.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Mechanical Engineering are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/ NECO/GCE O’level/ SSCE/ NABTEB- National Technical Certificate (NTC) Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

The subject must include:

1. English Language;

2. Mathematics;

3. Physics;

4. Chemistry;

5. Plus any one (1) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry, Further Mathematics, Economics, Statistics,            Technical Drawing, Auto-Mechanics, Metal Work, Tractor Mechanics, Refrigeration and Air Conditioning           .

 (In addition to the above), Applicants having NABTEB-National Technical Certificate (NTC) with            five (5) Credits Passes in the above must have a Credit Pass in the  Mechanical Trade Areas.

 

NOTE: Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate (NBC)
subjects:
-   English Language    

-   Mathematics

-   Physics

-   Chemistry.

The subjects must include:

1. English Language;

2. Mathematics;

Technical Drawing, Geography, Economics, ICT/Data Processing/Computer Studies, Further Mathematics, Agricultural Science/Biology/Animal Husbandry, Mining, Plumbing and Pipe Fitting/Welding and Fabrication, Engineering Craft Practice.

 NOTE: Only NABTEB National Technical Certificate (NTC) would be accepted for admission and not NABTEB National Business Certificate (NBC)
subjects:
-   English Language;

-   Physics;

-   Chemistry.

utme_requirements:
The Minimum entry requirements into National Diploma (ND) in Office Technology & Management are Five (5) Credits passes in WASC/NECO /GCE O’level/SSCE/NABTEB Examination at not more than two (2) sittings.

subjects:

subjects:

-   Any two (2) from Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts, Economics, Store Management, Marketing.
